intermediate_templates.rust:
FROM base-system:latest

ENV RUSTUP_HOME=/usr/local/rustup \
    CARGO_HOME=/usr/local/cargo \
    PATH=/usr/local/cargo/bin:$PATH

USER root
RUN curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y \
    && chmod -R a+w $RUSTUP_HOME $CARGO_HOME

# Pre-warm cargo cache with commonly used crates
RUN mkdir -p /tmp/cargo-warm && \
    printf '[package]\nname = "warm"\nversion = "0.0.0"\nedition = "2021"\n\n[dependencies]\ntokio = { version = "1", features = ["full"] }\nserde = { version = "1", features = ["derive"] }\nserde_json = "1"\nthiserror = "1"\nanyhow = "1"\ntracing = "0.1"\ntracing-subscriber = "0.3"\nasync-trait = "0.1"\nfutures = "0.3"\nreqwest = { version = "0.12", features = ["json"] }\nclap = { version = "4", features = ["derive"] }\n' > /tmp/cargo-warm/Cargo.toml && \
    mkdir -p /tmp/cargo-warm/src && \
    echo 'fn main() {}' > /tmp/cargo-warm/src/main.rs && \
    cd /tmp/cargo-warm && cargo fetch && \
    rm -rf /tmp/cargo-warm && \
    chmod -R a+w $CARGO_HOME

# Install rust-analyzer LSP for Rust code intelligence
RUN rustup component add rust-analyzer && \
    ln -sf $(rustup which --toolchain stable rust-analyzer) /usr/local/bin/rust-analyzer

USER agent

LABEL description="Rust intermediate layer"
intermediate_templates.foundry:
FROM rust:latest

ENV PATH=/root/.foundry/bin:/usr/local/cargo/bin:$PATH

USER root
RUN curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash \
    && /root/.foundry/bin/foundryup \
    && chmod -R a+rx /root/.foundry

USER agent

LABEL description="Foundry intermediate layer (forge, cast, anvil, chisel)"
intermediate_templates.scientific-python:
FROM base-system:latest

USER root
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages \
    numpy scipy pandas matplotlib seaborn plotly \
    scikit-learn scikit-image \
    jupyter jupyterlab ipython notebook \
    pillow opencv-python-headless \
    h5py pyarrow fastparquet \
    tqdm rich typer click \
    httpx aiohttp requests \
    pydantic pydantic-settings \
    python-dotenv PyYAML toml \
    && jupyter --version

USER agent

LABEL description="Scientific Python intermediate layer (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Jupyter, ML basics)"
intermediate_templates.go:
FROM base-system:latest

ENV GOROOT=/usr/local/go \
    GOPATH=/go \
    PATH=/usr/local/go/bin:/go/bin:$PATH

USER root
RUN ARCH=$(dpkg --print-architecture) && \
    if [ "$ARCH" = "amd64" ]; then GO_ARCH="amd64"; \
    elif [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then GO_ARCH="arm64"; \
    else echo "Unsupported architecture: $ARCH"; exit 1; fi && \
    curl -fsSL https://go.dev/dl/go1.22.0.linux-${GO_ARCH}.tar.gz | tar -C /usr/local -xzf - && \
    mkdir -p /go/bin /go/pkg /go/src && \
    chmod -R a+w /go

# Install gopls LSP for Go code intelligence
RUN go install golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest && \
    ln -sf /go/bin/gopls /usr/local/bin/gopls

USER agent

LABEL description="Go intermediate layer"

root_commands: if [ -f /root/.sp1/bin/sp1up ]; then /root/.sp1/bin/sp1up; cargo prove --version; else echo 'SP1 not installed'; fi
cargo install cargo-risczero && cargo risczero install || echo 'RISC Zero toolchain installed'
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matter-labs/anvil-zksync/main/scripts/install.sh | bash && chmod -R a+rx /root/.anvil-zksync || echo 'anvil-zksync installed'
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSfL https://solana-install.solana.workers.dev | bash || echo 'Solana installation may not support this architecture. Consider building from source.'

if [ -f /root/.local/share/solana/install/active_release/bin/solana ]; then /root/.local/share/solana/install/active_release/bin/solana --version && chmod -R a+rx /root/.local/share/solana; else echo 'Solana CLI not installed - platform may not be supported'; fi

ARCH=$(dpkg --print-architecture) && if [ "$ARCH" = "amd64" ]; then GO_ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then GO_ARCH="arm64"; else echo "Unsupported architecture: $ARCH"; exit 1; fi && curl -fsSL https://go.dev/dl/go1.22.0.linux-${GO_ARCH}.tar.gz | tar -C /usr/local -xzf - && mkdir -p /go/bin /go/pkg /go/src && chmod -R a+w /go
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && chmod -R a+w $RUSTUP_HOME $CARGO_HOME && rustup component add rustfmt clippy rust-analyzer

KOTLIN_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/JetBrains/kotlin/releases/latest | grep '"tag_name"' | sed -E 's/.*"v([^"]+)".*/\1/') && curl -sL https://github.com/JetBrains/kotlin/releases/download/v${KOTLIN_VERSION}/kotlin-compiler-${KOTLIN_VERSION}.zip -o kotlin.zip && unzip -q kotlin.zip -d /opt && rm kotlin.zip && chmod -R a+rx /opt/kotlinc
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages poetry black mypy ruff pipx
su - agent -c 'export PATH=/usr/local/go/bin:/go/bin:$PATH GOPATH=/go && go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest'
su - agent -c 'export PATH=/usr/local/go/bin:/go/bin:$PATH GOPATH=/go && go install golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest'
npm install -g @eth-optimism/supersim || echo 'Supersim installed for local OP Stack testing'

git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/hyperlane-xyz/hyperlane-monorepo.git /tmp/hyperlane && cd /tmp/hyperlane/rust && cargo build --release --bin validator --bin relayer && cp target/release/validator target/release/relayer /usr/local/bin/ && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/validator /usr/local/bin/relayer && rm -rf /tmp/hyperlane
git clone https://github.com/hyperliquid-dex/node.git /opt/hyperliquid-node && cd /opt/hyperliquid-node && git checkout 8a2c4b9e5757aafae5079f8236e3bf6752f7d81b && chmod -R a+r /opt/hyperliquid-node

echo 'deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-8.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu jammy/mongodb-org/8.0 multiverse' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-8.0.list
apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y mongodb-org && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

git clone https://github.com/tempoxyz/tempo.git /tmp/tempo && cd /tmp/tempo && git checkout 7e2c66842c2ef99e3f0670c63d9b92df20195af6 && cargo build --release && mkdir -p /root/.tempo/bin && cp target/release/tempo* /root/.tempo/bin/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tempo binaries copied' && chmod -R a+rx /root/.tempo && rm -rf /tmp/tempo
echo 'Tempo node built from https://github.com/tempoxyz/tempo at 7e2c66842c2ef99e3f0670c63d9b92df20195af6'
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages transformers datasets tokenizers accelerate peft diffusers safetensors huggingface_hub
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages langchain langchain-core langchain-community langchain-openai langchain-anthropic
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages vllm --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu || echo 'vLLM CPU build may have limited support'
echo 'vLLM CPU installed (limited functionality compared to GPU version)'
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages ipywidgets plotly bokeh altair
cargo install qdrant || (curl -sSL https://github.com/qdrant/qdrant/releases/latest/download/qdrant-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz | tar -xz -C /usr/local/bin || echo 'Qdrant binary installation')
apt-get update && apt-get install -y postgresql-16-pgvector && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
python3 -c 'from pymilvus import connections; print("PyMilvus installed")'
apt-get update && apt-get install -y redis-server && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y elasticsearch && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
echo 'Elasticsearch installed (run with: systemctl start elasticsearch)'
apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y clickhouse-server clickhouse-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -sSL "https://dl.min.io/server/minio/release/linux-${ARCH}/minio" -o /usr/local/bin/minio && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/minio

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -sSL "https://dl.min.io/client/mc/release/linux-${ARCH}/mc" -o /usr/local/bin/mc && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/mc

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -LO "https://dl.k8s.io/release/$(curl -L -s https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/${ARCH}/kubectl" && install kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl && rm kubectl

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -Lo /usr/local/bin/kind "https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/dl/v0.25.0/kind-linux-${ARCH}" && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kind

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -Lo /usr/local/bin/k9s.tar.gz "https://github.com/derailed/k9s/releases/latest/download/k9s_Linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz" && tar -xzf /usr/local/bin/k9s.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin k9s && rm /usr/local/bin/k9s.tar.gz

ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="amd64"; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi && curl -Lo /usr/local/bin/kustomize.tar.gz "https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/kustomize/releases/latest/download/kustomize_v5.4.1_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz" && tar -xzf /usr/local/bin/kustomize.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin && rm /usr/local/bin/kustomize.tar.gz
kubectl version --client && helm version && kind version && k9s version
apt-get update && apt-get install -y terraform && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages pulumi pulumi-aws pulumi-gcp pulumi-kubernetes

env.TEST_MNEMONIC: test test test test test test test test test test test junk

root_commands:
echo '#!/bin/bash
# Start anvil with pre-funded accounts (10000 ETH each)
# Mnemonic: test test test test test test test test test test test junk
# Account 0: 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266
# Account 1: 0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8
echo "Starting Base Sepolia fork with pre-funded accounts..."
anvil --fork-url https://sepolia.base.org --chain-id 84532 --balance 10000 --accounts 10 --mnemonic "test test test test test test test test test test test junk" "$@"' > /home/agent/.base-dev/start-base-fork.sh

echo '#!/bin/bash
# Mint test USDC to an address on local anvil
ADDRESS=${1:-0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266}
AMOUNT=${2:-1000000000000}  # 1M USDC (6 decimals)
RPC=${3:-http://127.0.0.1:8545}
USDC=0x036CbD53842c5426634e7929541eC2318f3dCF7e
echo "Minting $AMOUNT USDC to $ADDRESS..."
# Use foundry deal to set USDC balance (works on anvil forks)
cast rpc anvil_setBalance $ADDRESS 0x21e19e0c9bab2400000 --rpc-url $RPC 2>/dev/null
# For ERC20, we use storage slot manipulation. USDC uses slot 9 for balances.
SLOT=$(cast keccak $(cast abi-encode "f(address,uint256)" $ADDRESS 9))
cast rpc anvil_setStorageAt $USDC $SLOT $(cast to-uint256 $AMOUNT) --rpc-url $RPC
echo "Done. Check balance: cast call $USDC balanceOf(address)(uint256) $ADDRESS --rpc-url $RPC"' > /home/agent/.base-dev/scripts/mint-usdc.sh

echo '#!/bin/bash
# Show test account info
echo "=== Pre-funded Test Accounts ==="
echo "Mnemonic: test test test test test test test test test test test junk"
echo ""
echo "Account 0: 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266"
echo "Private Key: 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80"
echo ""
echo "Account 1: 0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8"
echo "Private Key: 0x59c6995e998f97a5a0044966f0945389dc9e86dae88c7a8412f4603b6b78690d"
echo ""
echo "Account 2: 0x3C44CdDdB6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12FA4293BC"
echo "Private Key: 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a"
echo ""
echo "All accounts have 10000 ETH on local anvil fork."' > /home/agent/.base-dev/scripts/show-accounts.sh

env.TEST_MNEMONIC: test test test test test test test test test test test junk

ANVIL_PID=$!
sleep 3

echo ""
echo "Press Ctrl+C to stop..."
wait $ANVIL_PID' > /home/agent/.x402-dev/start-x402-dev.sh

root_commands:
echo '#!/bin/bash
# Start the full AA development stack (anvil + bundler)
echo "=== Account Abstraction Development Stack ==="
echo ""
echo "Starting Base Sepolia fork with pre-funded accounts..."
anvil --fork-url https://sepolia.base.org --chain-id 84532 --balance 10000 --accounts 10 --mnemonic "test test test test test test test test test test test junk" --port 8545 &
ANVIL_PID=$!
sleep 3
echo "Anvil running on http://localhost:8545"
echo ""
echo "Starting Alto bundler on port 4337..."
npx @pimlico/alto --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --entry-points 0x0000000071727De22E5E9d8BAf0edAc6f37da032 --port 4337 &
BUNDLER_PID=$!
sleep 2
echo "Bundler running on http://localhost:4337"
echo ""
echo "=== Test Accounts ==="
echo "Account 0 (Bundler Signer): 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266"
echo "Private Key: 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80"
echo ""
echo "=== Contract Addresses ==="
echo "EntryPoint v0.7: 0x0000000071727De22E5E9d8BAf0edAc6f37da032"
echo "EntryPoint v0.6: 0x5FF137D4b0FDCD49DcA30c7CF57E578a026d2789"
echo ""
echo "Press Ctrl+C to stop all services..."
function cleanup { kill $ANVIL_PID $BUNDLER_PID 2>/dev/null; exit 0; }
trap cleanup SIGINT SIGTERM
wait' > /home/agent/.aa-dev/start-aa-stack.sh

echo '#!/bin/bash
# Deploy a simple verifying paymaster for testing
echo "Deploying test verifying paymaster..."
# This is a placeholder - in production you would deploy actual paymaster contracts

echo ""
echo "Available paymaster options:"
echo "1. Pimlico Paymaster (hosted): https://api.pimlico.io/v2/base-sepolia/rpc?apikey=YOUR_KEY"
echo "2. Coinbase Smart Wallet (gasless for eligible txs)"
echo "3. Deploy your own VerifyingPaymaster contract"' > /home/agent/.aa-dev/scripts/deploy-paymaster.sh

echo ""
echo "Smart Account Factories (Base Sepolia):"
echo "  Coinbase Smart Wallet: 0x0BA5ED0c6AA8c49038F819E587E2633c4A9F428a"
echo "  Safe Proxy Factory: 0xa6B71E26C5e0845f74c812102Ca7114b6a896AB2"
echo "  Kernel v3 Factory: 0x6723b44Abeec4E71eBE3232BD5B455805baDD22f"' > /home/agent/.aa-dev/scripts/show-info.sh
pip3 install --no-cache-dir --break-system-packages langchain langchain-core langchain-openai langchain-anthropic
python3 -c 'import langchain; import web3; print(f"LangChain {langchain.__version__}, Web3.py installed")'
